#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
        int t,n,i,l;
        scanf("%d",&t);
        while(t--) {
                scanf("%d",&n);
                int a[n];
                for (i=0;i<n;i++) {
                        scanf("%d",&a[i]);
                }
                if (n==1) {
                        printf("%d\n",a[0]);
                        continue;
                }
                if (n%2==0) {
                        printf("-1\n");
                        continue;
                }
                if (n%2 != 0) {
                        sort(a,a+n);
                        l=n/2;
                        printf("%d\n",a[l]);
                }
        }
        return 0;
}
